content: **pattern info** let s hear it for free patterns and free breakfast when you can get it this waffle hat is designed to fit everyone in the family it is sized to fit baby through adult however my gauge is pretty loose so you may need to go up in needle size additionally the pattern details how to add stitches for even larger sizes this really is a solid hat recipe that can be used over and over smaller yarn weights can be substituted and held together to achieve gauge this pattern is highly adaptable to fit every knitter s needs and stash **materials** yarn sport or dk weight 150-300 yards 50-100 grams needles size us4 3 5mm 16 circular 40 circular or double-pointed needles tapestry needle
